rightPane.rightPane.saveAndTagAnother:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to save current tags and proceed to tag another item.
**UI Location**: Code Tagger → Right Pane (bottom button)
**When Users See This**: After selecting tags for the current code snippet.
**Technical Context**: Standard button text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Save and tag another…"
leftPane.codeInfo.youAreAssigningTags:
**Functional Purpose**: Informative text indicating the purpose of the tagging action.
**UI Location**: Code Tagger → Left Pane → Code Information (text above exercise/track details)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the code information in the left pane.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "You are assigning tags for"
leftPane.codeInfo.in:
**Functional Purpose**: Connector word for displaying exercise and track titles.
**UI Location**: Code Tagger → Left Pane → Code Information (between exercise title and track title)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the code information in the left pane.
**Technical Context**: This text is used to connect the `exercise.title` and `track.title` variables. The variables `exercise.title` and `track.title` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "in"
